channel.title: Making a jar help
channel.description:
Am using jar maker and it's says that i need to put in a manifest template, what should i put in?
Here is my run.bat
@echo off Title Steady-Pwn Client V.0.1_2 start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit
And should i revome all the .java files and keep the .class files

item.title: Making a jar help
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“iFuze, post:3, topic:392677”][quote author=Saphire` link=topic=489848.msg3581366#msg3581366 date=1303827462]
For the main manifest you need to put client.
[/quote]

Thx, but now when i lounch it it’s saying cache can’t be downloaded?[/quote]
Then your client cant download the cache meaning you will have to put the cache in another .zip folder and upload it to your webhost and change the link in ur client and jar and sign it again.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a jar help
item.dc:creator: @iFuze iFuze
item.description:
@iFuze wrote:

Am using jar maker and it’s says that i need to put in a manifest template, what should i put in?

Here is my run.bat

@echo off
Title Steady-Pwn Client V.0.1_2
start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit

And should i revome all the .java files and keep the .class files

Read full topic
